ygData.subject: RE: More OT stuff: Invisibility
ygData.msgSnippet: You should be able to.  I got killed by a lizard judicator swimming above the surface of the avatar room in cazic while i was underneath.  i convinced the GM
ygData.messageBody:
You should be able to. I got killed by a lizard judicator swimming above
the surface of the avatar room in cazic while i was underneath. i convinced
the GM it was a bug and got ressed.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 9 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> The only possible detrimental effect I see of levitate is if you are
> swimming, and suddenly levitated, wouldn't you pop to the
> surface? Since
> EQ apparently has a major problem with distinguishing
> vertical difference,
> any creature on the bottom of the ocean can attack you as
> though you were
> standing on it's head. Very annoying, because that means
> that you can't
> attack it, but it can attack you. *ahem* Nice double standard here,
> programmers. Can I report a death like that as a bug, since
> obviously, the
> monsters are exploiting it...
>
> Talies the Wanderer
